Description.Title: soil temperature model
Description.ExtendedDescription: Computes daily soil temperature using canopy temperature amplitude and minimum air temperature. The core routine updates a 1 cm-resolution soil temperature profile via an exponentially damped signal derived from fixed thermal diffusivity and diurnal frequency, with relaxation toward canopy temperature. The profile is aggregated to user-defined soil layers, and previous state variables (profile and canopy temperature) are updated for the next step. An initialization sets the initial profile and canopy temperature to the first-day mean air temperature.
Description.ShortDescription: Daily soil temperature profile and layer means computed from canopy temperatures and air temperature, with state initialization and update.

Input.description: Minimum canopy temperature used for amplitude

Input.name: max_temp
Input.description: Maximum canopy temperature used for amplitude

Input.name: layer_thick_or_depth

Input.name: temp_profile
Input.description: Soil temperature profile at 1 cm resolution (current step)

Input.name: prev_temp_profile
Input.description: Previous soil temperature profile (1 cm resolution)

Output.name: prev_temp_profile
Output.description: Updated soil temperature profile (1 cm resolution) after the step

Output.name: prev_canopy_temp
